doc.title: The Ramen Polls: And the winner is...... Santouka!
doc.text: Well/IN the/DT results/NNS are/VBP in/IN and/CC we/PRP have/VBN a/DT clear/NN winner/NN for/IN the/DT best/JJ Ramen/NN Ya/NN in/IN Singapore/NNP !/.
